resources.string: App crashed! Reporting the development team.

One Billion Acts of Kindness is an initiative created by the Orange County Department of Education and Orange County Superintendent of Schools Dr. Al Mijares to improve school climates, promote character and rally the community for greater civility. As the name suggests, the long-term goal is to register one billion good deeds. For more information, visit www.kindness1billion.org, and donâ€™t forget to share your kind acts on social media using the hashtag #kindness1billion.
